short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scrolls, replies, likes, follows, retweets to tweets based on settings. Built for X / Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to take your reply game to a whole new level on X / Twitter ?

Let this extension do the work while you sit back and relax.

Press "START" and watch it reply to Good Morning & Good Night tweets on the timeline for you.

Features:
- Automatically scrolls
- Automatically replies to tweets containing a GM or GN
- Automatically likes the tweet before replying
- Uses username to reply for a friendly touch
- Customizable and unlimited greetings: ‚òÄÔ∏è,  ‚òïÔ∏è,  ü•ê
- Many customizable parameters & settings

Try it now - for FREE!!
